channel.title: Data Flow Analysis on Himanshu Shah
channel.description: Recent content in Data Flow Analysis on Himanshu Shah

item.title: IIT Bombay
item.description: About As a Research Intern, I was working alongside Anshuman Dhuliya, a PhD student at IIT Bombay, on his project Synergistic Program ANalyzer (SPAN). My role was to contribute to the Front-end of SPAN - to create a source-to-source compiler that takes a high-level specification as input and transpiles it into its Python equivalent. Problem SPAN required data flow analyses as an input and in Python language to apply those optimizations to an input program.
